Class ControlsMap

java.lang.Object
gamePackages.controls.ControlsMap
public class ControlsMap extends Object
Maps keyboard input to commands for controlling the player and game interactions. This class uses a mapping between sets of key codes and corresponding command objects to execute specific actions based on user input.

  • Field Details

    • keyMappings

      public static Map<Set<Integer>,Command> keyMappings
      A static mapping of key combinations to commands. The keys are sets of integer key codes, and the values are command implementations.

    • delta

      public float delta

  • Constructor Details

    • ControlsMap

      public ControlsMap(Player player)
      Constructs a `ControlsMap` for the given player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to be controlled by the mapped commands. This constructor initializes the key-command mapping with predefined key combinations for: - Movement in all cardinal and diagonal directions (W, A, S, D combinations). - Dodging (SPACE key). Each mapping executes a specific action on the player, using the current delta for timing.
